column1: '''John Church''' voiced the part of [[Gaffer Gamgee]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] broadcast on the BBC, and [[Old Man Willow]] in the episode "The Adventures of Tom Bombadil" of the [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)
column3: 1992 ''Tales from the Perilous Realm'' radio series]].
